name: Lentai Games
description:
Lentai Games is a poker card game with vocaloid  characters doing lewd stuff.

Play as Len from vocaloid and interact with 8 different girls from the same anime universe to play card games in order to gain their affinity unlocking dialogues, events and sexual options.

Content for now:

  • Poker card game
  • 8 different girls to interact
  • Unlockable nudity

Future content:

  • Dialogues and character events
  • More varieties of card and dice games
  • Many more sexual content

Support me on Patreon if you are interested in the project.
